item.description:
*** Changed the date to Saturday in the hope that we may be able to try out Track 2, which is available for Arrive & Drive racing only on Saturdays ***

Let's go racing at the indoor track at F1 Boston in Braintree.
www.f1boston.com

Let's make the most of the promotion going on at F1 Boston, where you get the 4th Race Free with the purchase of a 3 Race Package ($75)

You are most welcome to come and join us for just one or two races as well, or a lot more than 4 - your choice.

Just arrive and drive. Racing suits, helmets and neck braces are provided by F1 Boston. No prior experience required. It's a blast if you are a first timer or a regular.

Let's hit the tracks.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the registration desk
item.name: Indoor racing @ F1 Boston
